narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  Applicant wishes to be licensed as a Class A dealer.
Applicant will send the license fee and a copy of the report to the Western Regional Office within 20 days to:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave
Bldg B MS 3W11
Ft. Collins, CO 80526
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL THE USDA LICENSE HAS BEEN ISSUED.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
